'''SIR''' is a [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "flow".<ref name=PE>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 385 (SIR-)</ref>
==Derivatives==
*[[Quenya]] ''sir-'', [[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]] ''sirya-'', [[Noldorin]] ''sirio'' ("flow")<ref name=PE/>
*[[Quenya]]/[[Kornoldorin|Old Noldorin]] ''[[sír|sīre]]'',<ref>{{VT|46a}}, p. 13</ref> [[Noldorin]] ''[[sîr]]'' ("river"); [[Quenya]] ''[[siril]]'' ("rivulet")<ref name=PE/>
{{references}}
